name: Solitaire (itch) (GrayDwarf)
description:
A simple game of solitaire with no frills, thrills, sounds, animations or anything else that you might find fun.

I used Solitaire as POC to get a basic card framework going in godot. No future updates planned. There are a gazillion versions of this game in the world and we don't really need another one. Not even sure why I'm putting it up here except to say "Done!" and maybe it makes me feel better to not just leave it sitting in a folder on my machine. I WAS HERE!
